General.Name: Viking Kagit ve Seluloz AS
General.Description: Viking Kagit ve Selüloz A.S. produces and sells papers for the cleaning paper industry in Turkey. It The company offers toilet paper, towels, napkins, box tissues, and wet towels under the Premia, Lily, Senso, Select, and Pufla brands. The company also exports its products to 23 countries, primarily to the Europe and Central Asian Republics. The company was founded in 1969 and is headquartered in Izmir, Turkey. Viking Kagit ve Selüloz A.S. is a subsidiary of Yasar Holding A.S.
